Dialogue.Page: H-hey, hatchling! Hope you’re doing well! Although, I guess you listening to this means that you have to at least be alive, right?
Unless you, like, crashed nearby and some rubble hit the play button, in which case you totally might be dead. Ah, I’m rambling again, sorry.

Anyway, the next button you need to press is the, um, right one… again. I would say the last button you need to press but, um, surprise! You actually still have one more hint to find. I would tell you who from but, uh, they asked that I keep it a surprise.
When I get scared out here, in space I mean, one of the big things that helps me is that I can pull out my signalscope, listen to the other travelers, and know I’m not alone.

I know that that’s, well, really sappy, but I really do mean it, and I wanted to involve that in where I hid the last recording. So, um, I put it at Esker’s favorite spot to listen to the other travelers. S-stay safe hatchling!
